title: She Got Me: Ayana
description:
Taye's back in Atlanta and an old classmate wants him at all costs!
This married man with kids is doing well for himself. Now living in California, his past is his past. This hitta has a supermodel-looking wife and a nice house. What else could he ask for?When he runs into Ayana at a classmate's barbecue, her sexy drunken appearance was tempting his heart to make a move. She's all alone, curvy with hazel eyes, lying on the grass, laughing for spilling her drink. What does Taye do? It was on when they spotted each other. He's thinking "that girl in high school looked different." Ayana continually stares at him with one thing in mind!
With wifey and the kids back in Cali, Taye might be able to keep this on the down low or will he?
author: Just Bae
